alert.note: Alert for Kent; Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 2:02AM EDT until June 27 at 2:30AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN WORCESTER...WESTERN KENT AND PROVIDENCE COUNTIES... At 202 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Foster, or near Coventry, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Cranston, Woonsocket, Coventry, Cumberland, Johnston, Smithfield, Lincoln, Killingly, Bellingham, Burrillville, Uxbridge, North Smithfield, Scituate, Glocester, Blackstone, West Greenwich, Foster, Sterling and Millville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
